sources.title: Girls On The Loose (1958)
sources.description: Mara Corday, Barbara Bostock, Peter Mark Richman Directed by Paul Henreid

metadata.Plot: Vera (Mara Corday) runs a nightclub that's really a front for her secret operation: an all-female crime ring that's been pulling off heist after heist. The gang does a major job with the help of Agnes (Abby Dalton), a new recruit and insider with access to a bank's payroll. But then the nervous Agnes threatens to squeal, so Vera has her rubbed out. And when Vera's good-girl sister, Helen (Barbara Bostock), starts dating suspicious policeman Bill (Mark Richman), Vera gets really cutthroat.
metadata.Writer: Alan Friedman, Julian Harmon, Dorothy Raison
metadata.Actors: Mara Corday, Lita Milan, Barbara Bostock
